responses.ae053e48-981e-4b8a-9b88-220f6b39267b: The Facial Treatment Essence by SK-II promotes skin cell renewal and improves radiance through its key ingredient, Pitera. Pitera is a bio-ingredient rich in vitamins, minerals, and amino acids that helps to renew skin cells, reduce wrinkles, refine texture, and enhance radiance. With 90% Pitera in the essence, it effectively nourishes the skin and supports its natural renewal process, resulting in improved skin texture and radiance.
responses.6bf2bbe8-699f-443f-8604-c7812af94fe1: The key benefits of using LA MER's The Moisturizing Soft Cream include delivering healing moisture, visibly diminishing fine lines, helping skin look firmer, healthier, and revitalized, and strengthening the skin barrier.
responses.76552e1b-4e48-4fca-bccd-72269d50444c: The GenOptics Aura Essence Serum targets dark spots and dullness in the skin by using SK-II's signature Pitera ingredient, which helps reduce the appearance of melanin and promote a more radiant, even-toned complexion. Additionally, the serum contains ingredients such as Niacinamide, Panthenol, and Prunus Mume Fruit Extract, which are known for their brightening and skin tone-evening properties.
responses.84ecff3e-76d4-4be2-b945-a511214e424a: The key ingredients in the SK-II Facial Treatment Essence Mini are Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate (Pitera), Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Water, Sodium Benzoate, Methylparaben, and Sorbic Acid.
responses.26f9e777-dcf0-4e37-b004-4b3e76cf202c: The Facial Treatment Essence Mini is suitable for all skin types, including Dry, Normal, Oily, and Sensitive skin.
responses.c779f021-e14e-4663-a24a-86e95001122a: The size of the travel-sized version of the essence is 2.5 oz (75ml).
responses.1e6d853a-5562-49ec-8c9e-2a41c3f83f1b: The Facial Treatment Essence Mini is a travel-sized version of SK-II's iconic essence that delivers the same skin-renewing benefits as the full-sized version. The main difference is that the Mini version is more portable and affordable, making it convenient for on-the-go use. The Mini version comes in a smaller size of 2.5 oz (75ml), making it easier to carry while still providing the same benefits for all skin types.
responses.e8d8ed33-3faf-433e-8b78-7679988d3750: The price of the SK-II Facial Treatment Essence Mini is $99.
responses.d536b9b7-1ccd-44f7-aa36-00cce2e33f3b: The Moisturizing Cool Gel Cream by LA MER is suitable for normal to oily skin types. It is a lightweight gel cream that reduces shine while providing hydration, making it ideal for those with normal to oily skin.
responses.2358cbd8-5a78-4cf6-ae1a-0764610687fc: The Ultra Facial Oil-Free Gel-Cream provides hydration without greasiness for oily and normal skin types by using Glacial Glycoprotein to maintain the skin's moisture balance. Additionally, the gel moisturizer is oil-free and designed to be shine-reducing, making it ideal for those with oily or normal skin types.
responses.b6a0076c-dc99-4ae2-9778-343a3598fa8d: Some key ingredients in La Mer's The Moisturizing Soft Lotion include Algae (Seaweed) Extract, Petrolatum, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus (Eucalyptus) Leaf Oil, Tocopheryl Succinate, Niacin, Water, Caffeine, Sodium Hyaluronate, and Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate.
responses.5604a5db-327b-454e-af50-8a449d6d0f87: The Moisturizing Soft Lotion is suitable for normal to combination skin types.
responses.c4eb375d-cf12-453f-813d-f0f8cc6d619c: The size of The Moisturizing Soft Lotion is 1.7 oz (50ml).
responses.5c9792de-8b56-480b-9b18-9d34bbe89025: The texture of The Moisturizing Soft Lotion is described as lightweight and fast-absorbing.
responses.9cfbebf6-f3ef-4d3a-a0a5-6abb45b74fd9: The price of The Moisturizing Soft Lotion is $270.
responses.7451adf3-a7df-41d0-b373-e44499582b89: Some of the benefits of using The Moisturizing Soft Lotion include fast absorption, lightweight texture, and transformative benefits from La Mer's miracle broth. It is suitable for normal to combination skin types.
responses.33142573-e7ed-4b3b-97d9-b30f088834cf: One specific extract mentioned in the ingredients of The Moisturizing Soft Lotion is Algae (Seaweed) Extract.
responses.86f082cf-1aeb-429b-b4ba-255c59bbbace: The fragrance in The Moisturizing Soft Lotion is described as containing notes of linalool, citronellol, hydroxycitronellal, geraniol, limonene, and benzyl salicylate.
responses.552196ea-816e-40d7-a89f-c30e016b3af9: The rank of The Moisturizing Soft Lotion is 3.6.
responses.7113f5a9-3566-4c03-9545-09143c22b82f: The absorption rate of The Moisturizing Soft Lotion is described as fast-absorbing.
responses.b1436e2f-76ad-4d3b-839d-00aeebfe6ae0: The Resilience Lift Night Lifting/Firming Face and Neck Creme works to improve skin while you sleep by helping to lift, firm, and repair the skin. It features photo-activated lifters and advanced technology to counter the effects of gravity and loss of elasticity, providing anti-aging benefits during the night.
responses.ae4db219-cc35-4fc6-bd23-a6158992470d: Some key ingredients in the Ultra Facial Moisturizer by KIEHL'S SINCE 1851 include Water, Squalane, Glycerin, Peg-100 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Triethanolamine, Phenoxyethanol, Sorbitan Oleate, Carbomer, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Stearic Acid, Beeswax, Myristyl Alcohol, Sweet Almond Oil, Apricot Kernel Oil, Tocopherol, and Avocado Oil.
responses.cb1a391a-0861-4f32-a309-8dc63ef85b15: The Ultra Facial Moisturizer is suitable for all skin types, including dry, normal, oily, and sensitive skin.
responses.5968f274-582c-4642-9685-4414d50621f3: The size of the Ultra Facial Moisturizer is 2.5 oz (75ml).
responses.4c06726a-20f0-430e-8511-20b637b733c9: The Ultra Facial Moisturizer provides hydration without heaviness by using a blend of botanical extracts and emollients. These ingredients help to nourish and hydrate the skin without leaving a heavy or greasy feeling.
responses.3dbe222e-581a-4e17-9fd9-0c738b96c9d5: The price of the Ultra Facial Moisturizer is $29.
responses.6c98008c-6dfa-47d1-b9ff-8bfb9c3106d7: The Advanced Night Repair Intensive Recovery Ampoules work by providing intensive treatment to boost skin's natural repair processes and strengthen the moisture barrier. The single-dose ampoules help repair the skin overnight, allowing for powerful recovery and rejuvenation.
responses.b95c87ee-0a30-4802-b18e-a6c5ae599ece: The Revitalizing Supreme+ Global Anti-Aging Cell Power Creme SPF 15 helps reduce the appearance of lines and wrinkles by promoting the skin's natural collagen production, resulting in a firmer and more youthful appearance.
responses.4095592e-8aed-4eb7-95a0-581d5ce57ba5: The brand of the moisturizer mentioned in the context information is KIEHL'S SINCE 1851.
responses.5933eac3-5292-419b-a28b-59f70cc073c1: The SPF protection level of the Ultra Facial Cream mentioned is SPF 30.
responses.01afc25e-005c-40ff-8da7-a5f197520e26: The Ultra Facial Cream SPF 30 is suitable for all skin types, including Dry, Normal, Oily, and Sensitive skin.
responses.281ad11b-cd95-433f-9fbc-e4dd18eb33d8: One container of the Ultra Facial Cream SPF 30 includes 1.7 oz (50ml) of product.
responses.2e96742f-5f6b-4ea4-8b01-fa78728005b4: The SK-II Facial Treatment Mask claims to visibly brighten, hydrate, and rejuvenate the skin in just one application.
responses.7324ef56-0f68-4350-973c-768e3972edcc: The main ingredient in the SK-II Overnight Miracle Mask is Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate, also known as Pitera.
responses.6a6a8da2-9959-425f-91eb-3cad2318fd40: The Overnight Miracle Mask works to replenish moisture, smooth texture, and restore skin's natural radiance by morning. It is infused with Pitera and is designed to work overnight as a treatment mask.
responses.5ba01c2b-ee7b-4d7f-b37d-34c3355d47ed: The Overnight Miracle Mask is suitable for all skin types, including Dry, Normal, Oily, and Sensitive skin.
responses.3754a6b3-c328-4701-a77e-aea370f18676: The size of the Overnight Miracle Mask is 2.8 oz (80g).

1. Replenishes moisture in the skin
2. Smooths texture of the skin
3. Restores skin's natural radiance by morning
responses.78661585-49ed-479f-b162-f9bf9bf186cf: Some key ingredients in the Calendula & Aloe Soothing Hydration Mask include Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Calendula Officinalis Flower, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Lemon Peel Oil, Paeonia Suffruticosa Root Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Cassia Angustifolia Seed Polysaccharide, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, and Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil.
responses.00c3cb29-054c-45ea-835f-b91d9fa9cf4f: The Calendula & Aloe Soothing Hydration Mask is suitable for dry, normal, oily, and sensitive skin types.
responses.db5863f6-7049-41e1-80d7-3cfe40485f1d: The Calendula & Aloe Soothing Hydration Mask provides hydration for the skin through its ingredients such as Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, which is known for its soothing and hydrating properties, and Glycerin, which helps to attract and retain moisture in the skin. Additionally, the mask contains Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, which can help to calm and replenish dry, sensitive, or irritated skin, leaving it feeling hydrated and refreshed.
responses.42470d95-639b-4652-8bc0-c2bf8025cf8d: The size of the Calendula & Aloe Soothing Hydration Mask is 3.4 oz (100ml).
responses.e5f92714-de44-49c3-af7e-069bc46b2731: The Calendula & Aloe Soothing Hydration Mask helps calm and replenish the skin by providing immediate soothing hydration with its refreshing gel formula containing calendula flower petals and aloe vera. This is particularly beneficial for dry, sensitive, or irritated skin, leaving it feeling calm and replenished.
responses.06c6c46b-8a69-48ae-9880-3ed86a63e6b9: The Brightening Derm Revival Mask helps improve the skin's appearance by brightening and evening skin tone, diminishing the appearance of dark spots and dullness for a more radiant complexion.
responses.3a6ecef8-22f6-4e9c-9b11-1b38b64faab6: Some key ingredients in the Ginger Leaf & Hibiscus Firming Mask include ginger leaf extract, hibiscus seed extract, mango seed butter, shea butter, sweet almond oil, turmeric root extract, lavender oil, and basil flower/leaf extract.
responses.e98b1365-fdc3-43e5-a3e0-4a07d9c35c7f: The Ginger Leaf & Hibiscus Firming Mask helps improve skin's elasticity and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles through its formulation with ginger leaf and hibiscus seed extract. These ingredients work together to visibly improve skin's elasticity and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
responses.cd67d8f1-9fde-4a8a-87b9-afcf00c7f4ef: The Ginger Leaf & Hibiscus Firming Mask is suitable for all skin types, including dry, normal, oily, and sensitive skin.
responses.7b089696-c920-472c-817f-4ffa80017c22: The size of the Ginger Leaf & Hibiscus Firming Mask is 3.5 oz (100ml).
responses.1d76cb28-16f4-47d9-9a52-b72ace90bd26: The Treatment Lotion Hydrating Mask by LA MER delivers intense moisture and renewal to the skin in just one use through its innovative hydrating sheet masks infused with La Mer's treatment lotion and miracle broth. These masks are designed to deeply hydrate the skin and provide a renewing effect, transforming the skin after just one use.
responses.5c4b313a-38b2-4826-92da-c10ff1334f72: Some key ingredients in the Treatment Lotion Hydrating Mask by LA MER that contribute to its hydrating and renewing properties are Algae (Seaweed) Extract, Glycerin, Methyl Gluceth-20, Bis-Peg-18 Methyl EtherDimethyl Silane, Butylene Glycol, and Sodium Hyaluronate.
responses.35808c80-b3a2-41ec-aeb4-3b7fe4fae2fb: The Treatment Lotion Hydrating Mask is suitable for dry, normal, oily, and sensitive skin types.
responses.7c9203fa-2f83-4ed7-b349-8ca66cd6eff8: There are 6 sheets included in one pack of the Treatment Lotion Hydrating Mask.
responses.3954b29a-066b-4349-abf4-18580c462cf6: The main purpose of the innovative hydrating sheet masks infused with La Mer's treatment lotion and miracle broth is to deliver intense moisture and renewal, transforming skin in just one use.
responses.ee880622-d1a7-4ecb-8748-390b215dcbfc: The key benefits of the Advanced Night Repair Concentrated Recovery Eye Mask in targeting signs of fatigue and aging around the delicate eye area include reducing puffiness, fine lines, and dark circles for a refreshed appearance.
responses.face9cfe-4515-4029-90e1-8c062483867c: Some key ingredients in the Cilantro & Orange Extract Pollutant Defending Mask include cilantro seed oil, orange fruit water, shea butter, glycerin, apricot kernel oil, olive fruit oil, squalane, neohesperidin dihydrochalcone, tocopherol, ferulic acid, lavender oil, peppermint oil, rice bran oil, and various fruit extracts such as Vaccinium Myrtillus, Sugar Cane, Lemon, and Sugar Maple.
responses.8ab074e5-d2b4-4d68-ab5d-d2dd6a8f2bab: The Cilantro & Orange Extract Pollutant Defending Mask helps defend against environmental pollutants by using cilantro and orange extract to purify the skin and gently remove impurities, resulting in clearer and healthier-looking skin.
responses.33eb2717-7e24-4750-88db-4ba53b658502: The Cilantro & Orange Extract Pollutant Defending Mask is suitable for all skin types, including dry, normal, oily, and sensitive skin.
responses.2ae4dc64-43b9-4419-9879-80bd232716ab: The size of the Cilantro & Orange Extract Pollutant Defending Mask is 2.5 oz (75ml).
responses.3b0a74a5-9f62-437e-a268-c89cb5dffcd5: The Cilantro & Orange Extract Pollutant Defending Mask works by using cilantro and orange extract to help defend against environmental pollutants while gently removing impurities from the skin. This process ultimately leads to clearer, healthier-looking skin.
responses.58998f79-5c99-44e6-8089-474f74c4958b: The Advanced Night Repair Eye Concentrate Matrix uses a matrix technology to provide 360° eye support for a more lifted appearance.
responses.271cfbdc-a172-4e5b-9bc1-94d1618b5774: Some key ingredients in the Advanced Night Repair Eye Concentrate Matrix are Water, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Caffeine, Sodium Hyaluronate, and Vitamin E (Tocopheryl Acetate).
responses.ea5c51c5-901a-47da-bd9a-0b7711ab23f1: The Advanced Night Repair Eye Concentrate Matrix is suitable for dry, normal, and oily skin types.
responses.407248f5-f5de-41f8-80e6-389d3faaa488: The Advanced Night Repair Eye Concentrate Matrix targets puffiness, fine lines, and crepiness around the eyes by using a matrix technology that provides 360° eye support for a more lifted appearance.
responses.5129ecd1-ba43-4fc4-93db-0e25bf956ce5: The size of the Advanced Night Repair Eye Concentrate Matrix product is 0.5 oz (15ml).
responses.f1f5136f-2be9-488b-8eae-970d3aa23102: The key benefits of the Advanced Night Repair Eye Serum Synchronized Complex II are reducing the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and dark circles, as well as hydrating and fortifying the delicate skin around the eyes.
responses.f3b06b58-c0d5-433a-9190-ebf7768a96dd: The key ingredients in the Youth Dose Eye Treatment by KIEHL'S SINCE 1851 are pro-retinol, vitamin C, and grape seed extract.
responses.61a25aa2-c53f-4a88-8904-fde5a9b7d914: The Youth Dose Eye Treatment aims to improve the appearance of the under-eye area by diminishing dark circles, fine lines, and puffiness. It is formulated with pro-retinol, vitamin C, and grape seed extract to help achieve these results.
responses.10cde43a-0391-4d87-8ea6-a56584e298d3: The Youth Dose Eye Treatment is suitable for all skin types, including Dry, Normal, Oily, and Sensitive skin.
responses.b8c3a54e-b4e6-43b9-b843-67b5bd0e2ade: The Youth Dose Eye Treatment is available in a size of 0.5 oz (15ml).
responses.0999f2e3-70fa-4c7b-b63d-cc26ae587e1e: The Youth Dose Eye Treatment addresses concerns such as dark circles, fine lines, and puffiness around the eyes by being formulated with pro-retinol, vitamin C, and grape seed extract. These ingredients work together to help diminish dark circles, fine lines, and puffiness, resulting in brighter and smoother under-eye area.
responses.574b51ab-e29b-4cd3-a031-af18d4a89b9f: The Powerful-Strength Line-Reducing Eye-Brightening Concentrate works by combining powerful vitamin C with illuminating minerals to help visibly reduce the appearance of lines and dark circles around the eyes. The vitamin C helps to brighten the skin and improve the overall appearance, while the illuminating minerals work to reduce the appearance of dark circles, resulting in brighter-looking eyes.
responses.d4f55c99-5297-4259-8196-5c30a3799f2f: The Clearly Corrective™ Dark Circle Perfector works to improve the appearance of dark circles over time by delivering skincare benefits that help to reduce the appearance of dark circles. The product contains ingredients such as 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Zinc Pca, Caffeine, and Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, which work together to target dark circles and improve their appearance with continued use.
